    • assertAndHandle

      public static boolean assertAndHandle(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.channel.middleman.GuildMessageChannel channel, ILocalizer localizer, List<Long> ignoredGuilds, Permission... permissions)
      Checks if the self user has the permissions in this channel and sends an permission error if one is missing.
      Parameters:
      channel - channel to check
      localizer - localizer
      ignoredGuilds - guild where no error handling should be done.
      permissions - permissions to check
      Returns:
      true if a permission was missing and a message was send
